page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS GOYTRE AREA
page.content: { June 27th 1985.} POLICE CHASE ENDS IN ARREST A man armed with a shotgun was pursued by policemen from three police forces in the Gilwern,Crickhowell and Llangattock mountain area on Sunday night. He was finally arrested at Talybont early on Monday morning. JOHN IN FIFTH SPOT Abergavenny's discus thrower John Buttriss competing in his first AAAs championships at Cwmbran since 1979, finished fifth out of fifteen with a throw of 38.40m. in appalling weather conditions. Â£5m.SHOPS SCHEME SET FOR GO AHEAD Work on the Â£5 million plus shopping precinct for Abergavenny town centre is expected to start this autumn. Construction work is expected to take fifteen months and the opening is set for the early part of 1987.
